posts.post_content:
Greetings Friends,

Up for your consideration are two T206 beaters. The price will be $SOLD22 (for the pair) if you use Paypal FF and are okay with me shipping the cards in a plain white envelope (and you trust the USPS to deliver that envelope). If you want, you can add $4 if you want a tracking number and want to use the regular Paypal option.

The Thomas card is in okay shape, no major paper loss but plenty of creases. The Shaw card has a scrapped back and is in poor condition.

Cards will be available until I post that they have been sold. I'm super quick with updating my for sale posts.

I have plenty of good trading and selling references if needed.

Thanks!
David
